<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dazzling Bullet](/Feats.aspx?ID=3253) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 136</row>

**Archetype** [Pistol Phenom](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=120)

**Prerequisites**
[Pistol Phenom Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3251)

</column>

---

Your tricks discombobulate your opponent, leaving spots in their vision from the bright flash of your gunshot reflected straight into their eyes (or other visual organs). Attempt a [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) check against the target creature's Will DC and make a ranged firearm Strike against that target. If the Strike deals damage to the target creature and you succeed at the Performance check, the creature is [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) for 1 round.
name: Dazzling Bullet
